snippet: Ratan Tata said the company’s focus on a super-low price tag was a mistake.
abstract: Ratan Tata said the company’s focus on a super-low price tag was a mistake.
lead_paragraph: Speaking in Paramus, New Jersey last Wednesday, Tata Motors chairman Ratan Tata said the company was looking to redo the Nano, which has been a commercial disappointment.

headline.main: Tata Motors to Revamp the Nano
